name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Blasters_Wrath_B
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Blasters Wrath B
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power and requires the user to be level 50.
